meanings.definition: A current of air flowing inwards.
meanings.sent1: The indrafts from the open window cooled the room quickly.
meanings.sent2: The indrafts created a refreshing breeze on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy chased after the indrafts, thinking they were a game.
meanings.sent4: The indrafts of inspiration filled her mind with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The indrafts of fresh air invigorated her senses.

meanings.definition: The act of drawing in or inhaling.
meanings.sent1: After the run, she took deep indrafts of air to catch her breath.
meanings.sent2: The doctor instructed him to take slow, steady indrafts through his nose.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about taking exaggerated indrafts before diving into the pool.
meanings.sent4: Her indrafts of courage helped her face her fears.
meanings.sent5: The indrafts of knowledge filled his mind with wisdom.

meanings.sent1: She quickly made indrafts of the design before finalizing it.
meanings.sent2: The artist's indrafts captured the essence of the landscape beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The indrafts of the new building plans were met with excitement by the team.
meanings.sent4: His indrafts of the character revealed a depth to the story.
meanings.sent5: The indrafts of the blueprint laid out the structure of the house.
